**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Separate NoSQL side business logic into one place, similar to https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/tree/master/common/persistence/sql

- [ ] cluster metadata
- [ ] history events
- [ ] namespace
- [ ] queue
- [ ] shard
- [ ] matching tasks
- [ ] visibility
- [ ] execution
- [ ] execution tasks
- [ ] execution util
title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - business logic vs query interfaces
